channel.title: Page on open collector

item.title: About
item.description:
open collector is just one person, Dave.

I’m a hobbyist hacking on MCUs, sensors, physical fabrication techniques, circuits, and on occasion, radio stuff.

I have experience and work with Linux/Unix related stuff, so you may see a bit of crossover into that from time to time.
